questions.questionText: Caller reports a blue Ford pick-up abandoned in front of his house for over a week. Choose the priority of this situation.

options.text: Priority 1 - An immediate threat to life or health
Priority 2 - An immediate threat to property
Priority 3 - A routine report or incident
Priority 4 - A public service or public education

questions.questionText: A 911 caller screams that there is a man waving a gun outside. Choose the priority of this situation.

Priority 2 - An immediate threat to property
Priority 3 - A routine report or incident
Priority 4 - A public service or public education
